Types

MikeResponse = object
  body*: string
  code*: HttpCode
  headers*: HttpHeaders
  Source Edit 
MikeRequest = ref object
  path*: string
  body*: string
  httpMethod*: HttpMethod
  queries*: Table[string, string]
  headers*: HttpHeaders
  response*: MikeResponse
  when not false:
      req*: Request

  else:
      futResponse*: Future[MikeResponse]
